heading: quake rocks turkey
subheading: another earthquake hit turkey on thursday, killing at least 17 people and trapping many more. the quake, measuring 7.2 on the richter scale, was centered in bolu and also felt in istanbul. residents were shaken earlier this august in a quake that killed at least 17,000 people and left hundreds of thousands homeless.
author: wired staff
text: another earthquake hit turkey on thursday, killing at least 17 people and trapping many more. the quake, measuring 7.2 on the richter scale, was centered in bolu and also felt in istanbul. residents were shaken earlier this august in a quake that killed at least 17,000 people and left hundreds of thousands homeless.
